title: El Costeno Fast Food LA
brief: A landing page for a local Colombian fast food place in Los Angeles. It's one of my favorite places to reconnect with Colombian culture and taste the best food in town.

title: Firebase Rules Learning Assistant
brief: An interactive learning tool designed to help developers understand, learn, and experiment with Firebase Security Rules for Cloud Firestore.

title: Aleja Clark Music Portfolio
brief: A personal portfolio for a musician to showcase her music and services. Including a custom Spotify player within the website.

title: Real Estate Portfolio
brief: A personal portfolio for a real estate agent to showcase her properties and services.

title: Uniencuentros
brief: A web platform for university events and gatherings. I created this project to help my professor with his events organization and management, and to provide some value to his mission.

title: Code Craft Guidelines
brief: A landing page for a coding guidelines platform.
